arStrings.szText: {c_important}Meteorites{/c} fall around {c_important}Meteor{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage on impact. Your {c_important}Meteorites{/c} additionally Burn enemies they hit for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
